verses.text: \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \nd \+w God|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w*: \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w basket|strong="H3619"\w* \w of|strong="H3069"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w singing|strong="H7892"\w* women \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: \w Corpses|strong="H6297"\w* \w everywhere|strong="H3605"\w*, \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* \w out|strong="H7993"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w silence|strong="H2013"\w*.

mixing \w the|strong="H7069"\w* sweepings \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w with|strong="H1800"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*. Then \w we|strong="H3068"\w* can \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w the|strong="H7069"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w* \w for|strong="H3701"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pair \w of|strong="H3701"\w* \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*.

Now \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* taken \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H5331"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4639"\w*!

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \nd \+w God|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H2821"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* set \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w noon|strong="H6672"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w darken|strong="H2821"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w earth|strong="H8121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* broad \w daylight|strong="H8121"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w feasts|strong="H2282"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* mourning, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* dirges. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* cause \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* dress \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* shaved. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* lost \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w only|strong="H3173"\w* \w son|strong="H3173"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w happens|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* end \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w*.

d \+w God|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land. \w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w*

d*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w wander|strong="H5128"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* girls \w and|strong="H3117"\w* strong \w young|strong="H3117"\w* men \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w faint|strong="H5968"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*.

Those \w who|strong="H2416"\w* \w take|strong="H7650"\w* \w oaths|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* shameful idol \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w who|strong="H2416"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*, ‘\w As|strong="H6965"\w* \w surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*!’ \w and|strong="H6965"\w*, ‘\w By|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* sacred \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* Beer-sheba!’ – \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w again|strong="H5750"\w*.
